Welcome To
StartUp Career Fair 2023
Tell Me More

What is startup Career Fair?

Here's a glimpse of what we're all about.

General Overview

SCF is a dynamic, one-day, hybrid event that brings together innovative startup companies from across the United States to showcase their company to the student community at UIUC.

What Do We Do?

SCF allows students to discover career opportunities and gain possible internships with emerging startups while engaging in meaningful conversations with their potential employers.

What Are Our Goals?

SCF's overaarching goal is to create connections between college students and the entrepreneurship ecosystem for the overall benefit of both students and startups.

Attending Startups

What Can You Expect?

Here's a full breakdown of what's going on at this year's SCF!

  • Company Informational Session

    Startups introduce their innovative products and services, providing students with an opportunity to gain in-depth knowledge of their company. Startups can showcase their unique value propositions to enable students to explore potential career paths and entrepreneurial ventures. Students can develop a comprehensive understanding of the latest trends and developments in the industry, and hone their critical thinking through interaction with more experienced entrepreneurs.

    General Networking Session

    Students can gain valuable insights and practical experience by interacting with a diverse group of startups. They can learn about real-world applications of their academic learning, network with entrepreneurs and business leaders, and explore different industries and sectors.

  • Scheduled Individual Meetings

    SCF offers students a platform for deeper engagement, allowing them to delve into the intricate workings of startups and gain valuable insights to better identify potential career paths they might want to explore.

  • Beyond The Event

    Our primary goal is to serve as a bridge between students and startups, forming connections that are both meaningful and sustainable. At SCF, we're laying the foundation for professional journeys that continue far beyond a single event.

  • Be Part
    Of Startup Career Fair
    2023!
